definitions: joining or linking things together, especially so as to provide access and communication

examples.text: he went back to his office, leaving the connecting door open

definitions: (of a train, aircraft, etc.) timed to depart just after another train, etc. has arrived so that passengers can transfer

examples.text: connecting trains are available to Gatwick
we missed the connecting flight to the USA

shortDefinitions: timed to arrive at destination just before another departs
